Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act. ¨          
ITEM 7.01 REGULATION FD DISCLOSURE.

On September 21, 2021, U.S. Bancorp (the
“Company”) issued
a press release announcing the entry into a
definitive agreement to acquire MUFG Union
Bank, N.A., from Mitsubishi UFJ Financial
Group.

On September 21, 2021, the Company also held a
conference call with
investors regarding the announcement. The
Company made available on its website
electronic presentation slides used in
connection with
the conference call. Copies of the Company’s
press release and electronic presentation
slides are attached as Exhibits 99.1 and
99.2 to this Report, respectively.

In accordance with general instruction B.2 of
Form 8-K, the information
in this report (including exhibits) that is
being furnished pursuant to Item 7.01 of Form
8-K shall not be deemed to be “filed”
for the purposes of Section 18 of the Exchange
Act or otherwise subject to liabilities of
that section, nor shall they be deemed
incorporated
by reference in any filing under the
Securities Act or the Exchange Act, except as
expressly set forth in such filing.

ITEM 9.01 FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND EXHIBITS.

(d) Exhibits.
